message.content:
Here is a sample healthy meal plan for 7 days:

Day 1:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with honey, fresh berries, and a sprinkle of granola
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with spinach, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and a light vinaigrette dressing
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables, quinoa, and a side of whole-grain bread

Day 2:
- Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk, chia seeds, and a sprinkle of cinnamon
- Lunch: Lentil soup with whole-grain bread and a drizzle of olive oil
- Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with ground turkey, avocado, and a side of whole-grain bread

Day 3:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with spinach, banana, almond milk, and a drizzle of maple syrup
- Lunch: Roasted sweet potatoes with a side of whole-grain bread
- Dinner: Grilled steak with roasted root vegetables, quinoa, and a side of whole-grain bread

Day 4:
- Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk, chia seeds, and a sprinkle of cinnamon
- Lunch: Lentil soup with whole-grain bread and a drizzle of olive oil
- Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with ground turkey, avocado, and a side of whole-grain bread

Day 5:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with spinach, banana, almond milk, and a drizzle of maple syrup
- Lunch: Roasted sweet potatoes with a side of whole-grain bread
- Dinner: Grilled steak with roasted root vegetables, quinoa, and a side of whole-grain bread

Day 6:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with honey, fresh berries, and a sprinkle of granola
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with spinach, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and a light vinaigrette dressing
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables, quinoa, and a side of whole-grain bread

Day 7:
- Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk, chia seeds, and a sprinkle of cinnamon
- Lunch: Lentil soup with whole-grain bread and a drizzle of olive oil
- Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with ground turkey, avocado, and a side of whole-grain bread

This meal plan is designed to provide a balanced and nutritious diet, with plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. It also includes a variety of healthy snacks and side dishes to keep you feeling full and energized throughout the week..
